statements: DELETE FROM Coaches WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Coaches WHERE coach_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Training WHERE drill_name = 'Passing Drills';
DELETE FROM Training WHERE coach_id = 2 AND drill_name = 'Passing Drill';
DELETE FROM TrainingDrills WHERE coach_id = (SELECT coach_id FROM Coaches WHERE name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM TrainingDrills WHERE coach_id = 105 AND drill_duration > 30;
DELETE FROM GameStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Defensive Strategy';
